title: About this App
pageContent:
To learn more about the team behind OCTcases see the About Us page.
**App developed by:** [Jeremy Moreau](https://jeremymoreau.com) For questions, suggestions, or bug reports about this app send an email to: Jeremy Moreau (tap to reveal email)
Issues and pull requests are also welcome on the project GitHub: [github.com/jeremymoreau/OCTcases](https://github.com/jeremymoreau/OCTcases) ### Open Source Acknowledgments - [core-js (MIT)](https://github.com/zloirock/core-js) - [Ionic Framework (MIT)](https://github.com/ionic-team/ionic-framework) - [Marked (MIT)](https://github.com/markedjs/marked) - [Viewer.js (MIT)](https://github.com/fengyuanchen/viewerjs) - [Vue (MIT)](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-next) - [Vue Router (MIT)](https://github.com/vuejs/vue-router-next)
